Module kivakit.commandline
Package com.telenav.kivakit.commandline

Class CommandLine

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.commandline.CommandLine
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.string.AsString, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.string.StringFormattable, Iterable<ArgumentValue>
public class CommandLine extends Object implements com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.string.StringFormattable, Iterable<ArgumentValue>
A parsed command line of switches and (non-switch) arguments.

Retrieving Switches and Arguments

The list of arguments can be retrieved with argumentValues() or by using the command line object in an advanced for loop. Switch values can be retrieved by passing a SwitchParser to get(SwitchParser) or get(SwitchParser, Object). The method has(SwitchParser) can be used to determine if a switch is present.

Error Handling

If an application encounters a logical problem with the command line input (like mutually exclusive switches or semantic problems), it can call exit(String, Object...) to terminate the application with appropriate usage help. An application might want to do this, for example, if two switches conflict or if a file is missing.
